src:
Edhy Prabowo akan Lengkapi 151 Jabatan Kosong di KKP
06 Nov 2019, 15:31 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Pradita Utama

Jakarta - Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan Edhy Prabowo menemukan adanya 151 posisi jabatan di Kementerian Kelautan dan Perikanan (KKP) yang ternyata kosong. Posisi itu kebanyakan diisi oleh orang dengan status pelaksana tugas (Plt).Edhy mengatakan, 151 posisi yang kosong itu tersebar di seluruh golongan, mulai dari eselon I, II, III dan IV. Hal itu pun sudah disampaikannya kepada Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi)"151 kekosongan jabatan eselon I sampai IV lebih dari satu tahun. Ini akan segera kami selesaikan dan sudah kami laporkan ke Bapak Presiden dan sudah diperintahkan untuk diisi," ujarnya di Gedung DPR, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Edhy mengaku sudah mulai memproses kekosongan posisi jabatan itu. Pihaknya sudah mulai mendapatkan data untuk golongan eselon II. "Saya minta semua eselon I, II, III, IV, saya mau tahu, saya mau kenal orangnya dan saya juga akan tanyakan ke sumber-sumber," tambahnya.Edhy menegaskan, bahwa dirinya akan memilih orang-orang yang mau bekerja dan mampu menyelesaikan permasalahan di sektor perikanan dan kelautan. Dia juga memastikan bahwa tidak akan ada orang titipan."Bukan karena harus orangnya menteri atau orangnya dirjen ini. Saya beri keleluasaan para dirjen untuk mengusulkan orang-orangnya. Pak presiden sudah memberikan arahan untuk segera diisi," tuturnya.Menurut Edhy, dirinya tidak akan mengambil orang-orang dari luar KKP untuk mengisi kekosongan jabatan itu. Asalkan memang ada di internal KKP yang dianggap mampu menduduki jabatan tersebut."Mengurusi SDM ini juga tidak gampang, kita perlu dengan teliti dan hati-hati. Supaya juga setelah melakukan pengisian jangan sampai ada demoralisasi, harus ada semangat baru di lingkungan KKP," tutupnya.Simak Video "Menteri KKP Blusukan Perdana ke Muara Angke"[Gambas:Video 20detik](das/fdl)
text:
Edhy Prabowo will Complete 151 Empty Positions at KKP
Nov 6 2019, 15:31 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Pradita Utama

Jakarta - Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Edhy Prabowo found 151 positions in the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) which turned out to be empty. The position was mostly filled by people with the status of executing the task (Plt). Edhy said, 151 vacant positions were spread across all groups, starting from echelon I, II, III and IV. He also said that to President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) "151 vacancies of echelon I to IV positions for more than one year. This will be resolved soon and we have reported them to the President and have been ordered to be filled," he said at the Parliament Building, Jakarta , Wednesday (11/06/2019). Edhy claimed to have begun to process the vacant position position. His party has begun to get data for echelon II groups. "I ask all echelon I, II, III, IV, I want to know, I want to know the person and I will also ask the sources," he added. Edhy emphasized that he would choose people who wanted to work and were able to complete problems in the fisheries and marine sector. He also ensured that there would be no entrusted people. "Not because the person must be the minister or the person is the director general. I gave the freedom of the directors to propose their people. The president had given directions to be immediately filled in," he said. According to Edhy, he would not taking people from outside the KKP to fill the vacant position. As long as there is an internal KKP that is considered capable of occupying the position. "Taking care of HR is also not easy, we need to be careful and careful. So that after filling it there must be no demoralization, there must be a new spirit within the KKP environment," he concluded Video Watch "KKP Minister Blusukan Prime to Muara Angke" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (das / fdl)
